arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Aston Villa – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland welcome Aston Villa to the Stadium of Light on Sunday, looking to achieve a feat not seen on Wearside for nearly 60 years. A victory would see the Black Cats win their opening three home games of a top-flight season for the first time since 1965.
